My Journey to Data Storyteller

Read My Blog

About Me

Hi, welcome to my blog. I'm currently a Master of Business Analytics and AI student at Ontario Tech University. Frontend developer with 7+ years of experience. I've lived in the US for 7 years and Berlin, Germany for 8 years before coming to Canada. I'm a proud Taiwanese.

I love coffee and snow. I'm now passionate about data visualization and storytelling. Through this blog, I share my journey exploring the intersection of data, analytics, and human connection.

Let's Connect

I'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, want to collaborate, or just want to share your thoughts on my blog posts. Feel free to reach out or connect with me via the below methods.

Notes on today's Ethic in AI class

September 17, 2025

Today one of my classmates shared this website that has very interesting interactive info graphics about wealth especially wealth of Elon Musk the the richest people in the world. I really like the comparision of how much/small normal people can earn vs how the rich people can own.

I got some project ideas for data visulaization while I was waiting for my turn to use the washroom there were only 3 stalls In Taiwan, there are some toielet that are equipped with a light indicator that shows which one is in use and not. There were also way more stalls for women than men, which makes big sense.

I like how these people / data experts use low tech techniques to present data visualization. Itâ€™s much appreciated in the days of advanced technology. https://www.amycesal.com/
